Judul: DESIGNING KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS FOR PROJECT RISK MANAGEMENT
Abstrak: Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) is a developing science that is now widely used by companies throughout the world. It is still new, and therefore still has room for development. Even so, many people believe that ERM is capable of increasing the effectiveness of company activities by reducing or even eliminating risks. This final project focuses on the implementation ERM, specifically in project risk management.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Prof. Dr. Sudarso Kaderi Wiryono
